[[Barcelona]], [[Catalonia]]
[[Spain]] | capacity = 15,276 | chairman = {{flagicon|Spain}} [[Joan Laporta]] | manager = {{flagicon|Spain}} [[Juan Carlos Rojo]] | league = [[Tercera DivisiÃ³n Groups 1-9|3Âª - Group 5]] | season = 2006â07 | position = [[Tercera DivisiÃ³n Groups 1-9|3Âª - Group 5]], '''13th''' | shirtsupplier = [[Nike, Inc.|Nike]] | shirtsponsors = No sponsor | pattern_la1=|pattern_b1=_halfbluestripes|pattern_ra1= | leftarm1=AA0000 |body1=AA0000 |rightarm1=26559B|shorts1=26559B|socks1=26559B | pattern_la2=|pattern_b2=|pattern_ra2= | leftarm2=FF8800|body2=FF8800|rightarm2=FF8800|shorts2=ff8800|socks2=FF8800 }} '''FÃºtbol Club Barcelona C''' was a [[Football in Spain|Spanish]] [[soccer|football]] team that folded on 2 July 2007. The [[youth team]] of [[FC Barcelona]], it played home games at the [[Mini Estadi]]. Founded in 1967 as ''Barcelona Amateur'', it adopted the name ''FC Barcelona C'' in 1993. Unlike the [[English football league system|English League]], youth teams in [[Spanish football league system|Spain]] play in the same football pyramid as their senior team rather than a separate league. However youth and [[reserve team]]s cannot play in the same division as their senior teams. FC Barcelona C last played in the [[Tercera DivisiÃ³n|fourth division]]. They were ineligible for promotion to the [[Segunda DivisiÃ³n B|third level]], as [[FC Barcelona B]] were playing in that category. Club president [[Joan Laporta]] chose not inscribe the team in ''[[Primera Catalana]]'' for 2007-08, after the B team dropped to the fourth level.[http://www.marca.com/edicion/marca/futbol/mas_futbol/es/desarrollo/1012299.html Barcelona C leaves the scene] {{es icon}} == Honours == * '''[[Copa Catalunya|Generalitat Cup]]''': 1984 *
